channel.title: My New FLASH for Website program
channel.description:
Need flash for your site?
Well this is one of my works. I will be posting ALOT MORE.
[flash=200,200]http://www.swfupload.com/view/126211.htm[/flash]
YOU CAN ADD YOUR OWN TEXT TO THIS ONE, IF YOU WOULD LIKE.
[flash=200,200]http://www.swfupload.com/view/122343.htm[/flash]
Here is another really nice one. Also we can add more text. I am just figuring that out now. Since I just learned how to add 2 pieces of text. And music we can add too. Hope you like this one too.
[flash=200,200]http://www.swfupload.com/view/123782.htm[/flash]
SO stay tuned.
if you do need flash for your site. Please contact me.
I will most likely just send you the whole template, since some sites need the template to go with the flash.
HERE IS MY NEW FLASH WITH SOUND:
[flash=200,200]http://www.swfupload.com/view/101614.htm[/flash]

item.title: My New FLASH for Website program
item.dc:creator: @xX00java00Xx xX00java00Xx

@xX00java00Xx wrote:

You do know that flash websites are VERY unstable and are hard for the user to use. They are not user friendly. I’ve tried them before and was not staisfied.

Read full topic

item.title: My New FLASH for Website program
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

eclipse245:

Seeing that others are really disrespectful and many in the Web Design section, don’t seem to know much about Marketing and Websites in General.

Problem is, there will always be more general users than people who know more than anything.

eclipse245:

I can tell that many members here are immature.

Not really. Forget about a few of them, and you’ll see a lot of us put up a good discussion. Sure, a lot of people here don’t like people from moparscape, but that’s life. No one likes moparscape.

Disregard that. You break the rules, you either want rep or $10 for your designs, when even you know these sites were done in a few days.

If your too much of a pussy to take some criticism, and go all guns blazing when you get flamed at, you probably should go to another forum, and feel free to bitch at us all you like. By the way, as if “fucking you flaming pieces of shit” isn’t mature, really, grow up.

EDIT: For the record, most sites I go to don’t use flash for everything, youtube uses flash for it’s media player but that’s it, even then, you can use Java or something with a bit more compatibility.

Read full topic

item.title: My New FLASH for Website program
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote=“kloplop321, post:7, topic:167265”]I am a flash developer, and I can see what effect you did on those, reminds me of some of the tutorials I’ve seen before, however it isn’t as advanced as doing it by pure actionscript

right now I am messing around with pendulum movements in flash with joint mechanics.
soon I am going to incorporate physics into it as well. My current flash project is a scripted walking stick-figure-based person. and this is not using movie clips and simple gotoAndPlay(X) stuff.

and seriously don’t mess with talking about Rep, Kai? that’s like saying only specific people are allowed to see. The moparisthebest community is also welcome to open source, I am though, highly against leachers.[/quote]
yeah klop’s designs are better than yours.

Read full topic

item.source: My New FLASH for Website program

item.title: My New FLASH for Website program
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

It is true that a complete flash website is a very bad idea, but you can do wonderful animations with it(coded and key-framed). It can do things much more smoother than javascript can with div’s
Flash also has the ability to call javascript functions in the HTML.

Flash isn’t as old as the idea of HTML but flash 1.0 came out a long time ago…
Its just that Adobe likes to be gay and not release their flash source to browser creators, and someone was able to make a 3rd party 6.0 flash plugin, which is open source and has been ported in many ways, even to the NDS (homebrew). If Adobe was gay and just released their plugin source(as in so web browsers can openly put it in their programs) it would be much more publicly available.

Flash is good for movies, online games(other than java), and it always should look the same on everything that has an interpreter for it, unlike how HTML can be viewed in many different ways (like IE compared to FF or Opera, IE looses).

Read full topic
item.source: My New FLASH for Website program

item.title: My New FLASH for Website program
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

I am a flash developer, and I can see what effect you did on those, reminds me of some of the tutorials I’ve seen before, however it isn’t as advanced as doing it by pure actionscript

right now I am messing around with pendulum movements in flash with joint mechanics.
soon I am going to incorporate physics into it as well. My current flash project is a scripted walking stick-figure-based person. and this is not using movie clips and simple gotoAndPlay(X) stuff.

and seriously don’t mess with talking about Rep, Kai? that’s like saying only specific people are allowed to see. The moparisthebest community is also welcome to open source, I am though, highly against leachers.
